languages.text: {n}Монстр дарит вам долгий взгляд, а затем гулко и не без уважения произносит:{/n} "Тебя ждут сильные враги. Достойное испытание".
{n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."
languages.original_text: {n}Монстр дарит вам долгий взгляд, а затем гулко и не без уважения произносит:{/n} "Тебя ждут сильные враги. Достойное испытание".

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster gives you a long stare, then says in a booming voice that carries a certain degree of respect,{/n} "Strong enemies await you. A worthy challenge."
{n}The monster gives you a long stare, then says in a booming voice that carries a certain degree of respect,{/n} "Strong enemies await you. A worthy challenge."
{n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."
{n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."
{n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."
{n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."

languages.text: {n}Le monstre vous observe longuement et déclare d'une voix puissante et empreinte d'un certain respect :{/n} « De redoutables adversaires vous attendent. Ce sera un défi de taille. »
languages.original_text: {n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le monstre vous observe longuement et déclare d'une voix puissante et empreinte d'un certain respect :{/n} « De redoutables adversaires vous attendent. Ce sera un défi de taille. »

languages.text: {n}这只怪物盯着你看了很久，随后以低沉的声音开了口。{/n}“强大的对手在等着你，这是场有价值的挑战。”
languages.original_text: {n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."

traits.locale_text: {n}这只怪物盯着你看了很久，随后以低沉的声音开了口。{/n}“强大的对手在等着你，这是场有价值的挑战。”

languages.text: {n}その怪物はあなたをじっと見たあと、敬意のこもった声でよく響くように話した。{/n}「手強い対戦者がお前を待っている。挑みがいのある相手だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."

traits.locale_text: {n}その怪物はあなたをじっと見たあと、敬意のこもった声でよく響くように話した。{/n}「手強い対戦者がお前を待っている。挑みがいのある相手だ」

languages.text: {n}Das Monster starrt dich lange an und spricht dann mit dröhnender Stimme. Trotzdem hörst du einen Unterton heraus, der respektvoll klingt:{/n} "Auf Euch warten starke Gegner. Eine würdige Herausforderung."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Monster starrt dich lange an und spricht dann mit dröhnender Stimme. Trotzdem hörst du einen Unterton heraus, der respektvoll klingt:{/n} "Auf Euch warten starke Gegner. Eine würdige Herausforderung."

languages.text: {n}El monstruo te mira fijamente durante un rato y luego habla con una voz estentórea no exenta de cierto respeto:{/n} «Le aguardan poderosos adversarios. Será un desafío digno».
languages.original_text: {n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."

traits.locale_text: {n}El monstruo te mira fijamente durante un rato y luego habla con una voz estentórea no exenta de cierto respeto:{/n} «Le aguardan poderosos adversarios. Será un desafío digno».

languages.text: {n}Canavar, uzun uzun sana baktıktan sonra tok bir sesle konuşuyor. Sesinde bir tür saygı seziliyor.{/n} "Güçlü rakipler sizi bekliyor. Size layık bir mücadele olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster gives you a long stare and then says in a booming voice that carries an undertone of respect,{/n} "Strong opponents await you. A worthy challenge."
